languages.text: "Босс, парни Деляги, которые зовутся анверами только по недоразумению, ушли трясти торговцев в Атриуме. Сколько мы будем это терпеть? Обычное ворье прикрывается нашим именем, и таких все больше. Они и листовки Главного не читали, я уверен! Босс, я знаю их маршрут — может, того, вальнем "кузенов"?"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Описание запсики с бандитов ртути наводящяя на Атриум

languages.text: "Boss, the Hustler's lads, the ones who call themselves Anvers only for show, went to shake down traders in the Atrium. How long are we going to put up with this? Common muggers are using our name, and there are more of them every day. They haven't even read the Man's words, I'm sure of it! Boss, I know their route — what do you say we get rid of our 'cousins' once and for all?"
languages.original_text: "Босс, парни Деляги, которые зовутся анверами только по недоразумению, ушли трясти торговцев в Атриуме. Сколько мы будем это терпеть? Обычное ворье прикрывается нашим именем, и таких все больше. Они и листовки Главного не читали, я уверен! Босс, я знаю их маршрут — может, того, вальнем "кузенов"?"

traits.locale_text: "Boss, the Hustler's lads, who call themselves Anvers only for show, went to shake down traders in the Atrium. How long are we going to tolerate this? Regular muggers are using our name, and there are more of them every day. They haven't even read the Man's words, I'm sure of it! Boss, I know their route — you feel like bumping off our 'cousins'?"

Common muggers are using our name, and there are more of them every day. They haven't even read the Man's words, I'm sure of it! Boss, I know their route — what do you say we get rid of our 'cousins' once and for all?"

languages.text: “老大，诈财帮那群家伙，他们打着安维尔帮的名号去敲诈中庭的商人。这种事情咱们到底还要忍多久？那群抢劫犯冒用着我们的旗号，而且这么干的人越来越多。那群人甚至都没有读过那位大人的语录，我敢肯定！我知道他们都在什么地方，不如咱们把这些‘表亲’彻底解决掉吧，你说怎么样？”
languages.original_text: "Boss, the Hustler's lads, the ones who call themselves Anvers only for show, went to shake down traders in the Atrium. How long are we going to put up with this? Common muggers are using our name, and there are more of them every day. They haven't even read the Man's words, I'm sure of it! Boss, I know their route — what do you say we get rid of our 'cousins' once and for all?"

traits.locale_text: “老大，诈财帮那群家伙，他们打着安维尔帮的名号去敲诈中庭的商人。这种事情咱们到底还要忍多久？那群抢劫犯冒用着我们的旗号，而且这么干的人越来越多。那群人甚至都没有读过那位大人的语录，我敢肯定！我知道他们都在什么地方，不如咱们把这些‘表亲’彻底解决掉吧，你说怎么样？”

languages.text: «Jefe, los alborotadores esos, los que solo son Anvers de nombre, han ido a extorsionar a los mercaderes del Atrio. ¿Cuánto tiempo vamos a aguantar esto? Unos ladrones comunes están usando nuestro nombre, y hay más de ellos cada día. ¡Ni siquiera se han leído Sus palabras, estoy seguro! Jefe, conozco su ruta. ¿Nos ocupamos de nuestros "primos" de una vez por todas?».
languages.original_text: "Boss, the Hustler's lads, the ones who call themselves Anvers only for show, went to shake down traders in the Atrium. How long are we going to put up with this? Common muggers are using our name, and there are more of them every day. They haven't even read the Man's words, I'm sure of it! Boss, I know their route — what do you say we get rid of our 'cousins' once and for all?"

traits.locale_text: «Jefe, los alborotadores esos, los que solo son Anvers de nombre, han ido a extorsionar a los mercaderes del Atrio. ¿Cuánto tiempo vamos a aguantar esto? Unos ladrones comunes están usando nuestro nombre, y hay más de ellos cada día. ¡Ni siquiera se han leído Sus palabras, estoy seguro! Jefe, conozco su ruta. ¿Nos ocupamos de nuestros "primos" de una vez por todas?».

languages.text: 「ボス、ハスラーの野郎ども、自分を伊達アンヴァースと呼ぶ者たちが、アトリアムの貿易商の取り締まりに行きました。これにあとどれだけ耐えればいいんですか？ありふれた強盗たちが我々の名を語っている。そのような悪党らは日々増える一方です。人の言葉を読んだことさえないに決まっています！ボス、私はあいつらのルートを知っています。一気に我々の「いとこ」を撲滅することについてはどう思われますか？」
languages.original_text: "Boss, the Hustler's lads, the ones who call themselves Anvers only for show, went to shake down traders in the Atrium. How long are we going to put up with this? Common muggers are using our name, and there are more of them every day. They haven't even read the Man's words, I'm sure of it! Boss, I know their route — what do you say we get rid of our 'cousins' once and for all?"

traits.locale_text: 「ボス、ハスラーの野郎ども、自分を伊達アンヴァースと呼ぶ者たちが、アトリアムの貿易商の取り締まりに行きました。これにあとどれだけ耐えればいいんですか？ありふれた強盗たちが我々の名を語っている。そのような悪党らは日々増える一方です。人の言葉を読んだことさえないに決まっています！ボス、私はあいつらのルートを知っています。一気に我々の「いとこ」を撲滅することについてはどう思われますか？」

languages.text: "Boss, die Jungs von Hustler, die sich nur zum Schein Anvers nennen, sind losgezogen, um die Händler im Atrium zu erpressen. Wie lange wollen wir uns das noch gefallen lassen? Gewöhnliche Straßenräuber benutzen unseren Namen, und es werden jeden Tag mehr von ihnen. Sie haben nicht einmal die Worte des Mannes gelesen, da bin ich mir sicher! Boss, ich kenne ihre Route — was hältst du davon, wenn wir unsere 'Vettern' ein für alle Mal loswerden?"
languages.original_text: "Boss, the Hustler's lads, the ones who call themselves Anvers only for show, went to shake down traders in the Atrium. How long are we going to put up with this? Common muggers are using our name, and there are more of them every day. They haven't even read the Man's words, I'm sure of it! Boss, I know their route — what do you say we get rid of our 'cousins' once and for all?"

traits.locale_text: "Boss, the Hustler's lads, the ones who call themselves Anvers only for show, went to shake down traders in the Atrium. How long are we going to put up with this? Common muggers are using our name, and there are more of them every day. They haven't even read the Man's words, I'm sure of it! Boss, I know their route — what do you say we get rid of our 'cousins' once and for all?"

languages.text: « Patron, les gars de l'Arnaqueur, ceux qui se font appeler Anver juste pour la forme, sont allés racketter les commerçants de l'Atrium. Combien de temps est-ce qu'on va tolérer ça ? Des bandits de bas étage usurpent notre nom et ils sont de plus en plus nombreux. Je suis prêt à parier qu'ils n'ont même pas lu les écrits du chef ! Patron, je connais leur itinéraire. Qu'est-ce que vous diriez de nous débarrasser de nos "cousins" une bonne fois pour toutes ? »
languages.original_text: "Boss, the Hustler's lads, the ones who call themselves Anvers only for show, went to shake down traders in the Atrium. How long are we going to put up with this? Common muggers are using our name, and there are more of them every day. They haven't even read the Man's words, I'm sure of it! Boss, I know their route — what do you say we get rid of our 'cousins' once and for all?"

traits.locale_text: « Patron, les gars de l'Arnaqueur, ceux qui se font appeler Anver juste pour la forme, sont allés racketter les commerçants de l'Atrium. Combien de temps est-ce qu'on va tolérer ça ? Des bandits de bas étage usurpent notre nom et ils sont de plus en plus nombreux. Je suis prêt à parier qu'ils n'ont même pas lu les écrits du chef ! Patron, je connais leur itinéraire. Qu'est-ce que vous diriez de nous débarrasser de nos "cousins" une bonne fois pour toutes ? »

languages.text: "Patron. Dolandırıcı'nın sırf hava basmak için kendilerine Anver diyen adamları, Atriyum'daki tacirlerden haraç toplamış. Daha ne kadar göz yumacağız buna? Ortalık gaspçıları adımızı kullanıyor, üstelik her gün de yenisi türüyor. Daha Şef'in sözlerini bile okumamışlardır, kalıbımı basarım! Nerede takılırlar biliyorum patron. Bu yancıların fişini çekmeye ne dersin?"
languages.original_text: "Boss, the Hustler's lads, the ones who call themselves Anvers only for show, went to shake down traders in the Atrium. How long are we going to put up with this? Common muggers are using our name, and there are more of them every day. They haven't even read the Man's words, I'm sure of it! Boss, I know their route — what do you say we get rid of our 'cousins' once and for all?"
